name: hvl-ccb
summary: Python common code base to control research devices, in particular, as used in Christian Franck's High Voltage Lab (HVL), D-ITET, ETH Zurich
author: Pit Bechtold, Fabian Bill, Alise Chachereau, Maria Del, Joseph Engelbrecht, Raphael Faerber, David Graber, Chi-Ching Hsu, Henning Janssen, Henrik Menne, Luca Nembrini, Mikołaj Rybiński, Ruben Stadler, David Taylor, Hanut Vemulapalli
